page.title: 16TRANSPORT 3
page.content: An R.A.F. station is in our area with a variety of military transport. This includes cars,lorries,buses ,1 rubbish cart,1 ambulance,1 fire truck, 12 Tanks (Scorpions), 30 armoured personnel vehicles (Spartans), 2 recovery vehicles (Sampsons),2 command vehicles (Sultans) and 16 Land Rovers. The Balloon Section includes vehicles (each travelling 1,000-1,500 miles each week) and 12 gas carrying 20 Tonne lorries.We are able to watch the Airmen practice parachute drops out of the balloon -basket on the airfield, from our school playground . At intervals Hercules aircraft bring men across the airfield to "drop" from the rear door. Annually Harriers use the airfield as a practice base.Some of the service children's houses are near the airfield and they watch the vertical take-offs with interest.
